Verses: 1 leyaal Yaakkobukkup Petra Kumaaraththiyaagiya Dheenaal Dhesaththup Pengalaip Paarkgap Purappattaal.
2 avalai Eviyanaana Emorin Kumaaranum Aththesaththin Pirabuvumaagiya Seekem Enbavan Kandu, Avalaik Kondupoi, Avalode Sayaniththu, Avalaith Theettuppatuththinaan.
3 avanudaiya Manam Yaakkobin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Theenaalmel Patrudhalaayirundhadhu; Avan Andhap Pennai Nesiththu, Andhap Pennin Manadhukku Inbamaaip Pesinaan.
4 seekem Than Thagappanaagiya Emorai Nokki: Indhappennai Enakkuk Kollavendum Endru Sonnaan.

5 than Kumaaraththiyaagiya Dheenaalai Avan Theettuppaduththinadhai Yaakkobu Kelvippattapodhu , Avan Kumaarar Avanudaiya Mandhaiyinidaththil Veliyile Irundhaargal; Avargal Varumalavum Yaakkobu Pesaamalirundhaan.
6 aththarunaththil Seekemin Thagappanaagiya Emor Purappattu, Yaakkopode Pesumpadi Avanidaththil Vandhaan.

7 yaakkobin Kumaarar Indhach Seydhiyaik Kettavudane, Veliyilirundhu Vandhaargal. Avan Yaakkobin Kumaaraththiyode Sayaniththu, Seyyaththagaadha Madhiketta Kaariyaththai Isravelil Seydhadhinaale, Andha Manidhar Manangodhiththu Migavum Kopangondaargal.
8  Emor Avargalode Pesi: En Kumaaranaagiya Seekemin Manadhu Ungal Kumaaraththiyinmel Patrudhalaayirukkiradhu; Avalai Avanukku Manaiviyaagak Kodungal.
9 neengal Engalode Sampandhangalandhu, Ungal Kumaaraththigalai Engalukkuk Koduththu, Engal Kumaaraththigalai Ungalukkuk Kondu,
10 engalode Vaasampannungal; Dhesam Ungal Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Idhile Kudiyirundhu, Viyaapaarampanni, Porul Sambaadhiththu, Adhaik Kaiyaandukondirungal Endraan.
11 seekemum Aval Thagappanaiyum Aval Sagodhararaiyum Nokki: Ungal Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavu Kidaikkavendum; Neengal Ennidaththil Edhaik Kettaalum Tharugiren;
12 parisamum Vegumadhiyum Neengal Evvalavu Kettaalum, Ungal Sorpadi Tharugiren; Andhap Pennaimaaththiram Enakku Manaiviyaagak Kodukgavendum Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Yaakkobin Kumaarar Thangal Sagodhariyaagiya Dheenaalaich Seekem Enbavan Theettuppatuththinapadiyaal, Avanukkum Avan Thagappanaagiya Emorukkum Vanjagamaana Marumozhiyaaga:
14 viruththasedhanamillaadha Purushanukku Naangal Engal Sagodhariyaik Kodukkalaagaadhu; Adhu Engalukku Nindhaiyaayirukkum.
15 neengalum, Ungalukkullirukkum Aanmakkal Yaavarum Viruththasedhanampannappattu Engalaip Polaaveergalaanaal, Naangal Sammadhiththu,
16 ungalukku Engal Kumaaraththigalaik Koduththu, Ungal Kumaaraththigalai Engalukkuk Kondu, Ungalode Kudiyirundhu, Egajanamaayiruppom.
17 viruththasedhanampannikkolvadharku Engal Sol Kelaamarpoveergalaanaal, Naangal Engal Kumaaraththiyai Azhaiththukkondu Poividuvom Endru Sonnaargal.
18 avargaludaiya Vaarththaigal Emorukkum Emorin Kumaaranaagiya Seekemukkum Nalamaaith Thondrinadhu.

19 andha Vaalipan Yaakkobudaiya Kumaaraththiyinmel Piriyam Vaiththirundhapadiyaal, Andhak Kaariyaththaich Seyya Avan Thaamadhampannavillai. Avan Than Thagappan Veettaar Anaivarukkullum Menmaiyullavanaayirundhaan.
20 emorum Avan Kumaaran Seekemum Thangal Pattanaththu Vaasalil Vandhu, Thangal Pattanaththu Manidharode Pesi:

21 indha Manidhar Nammode Samaadhaanamaayirukkiraargal; Aagaiyaal, Avargal Indhath Dhesaththil Vaasampanni, Idhile Viyaapaarampannattum; Avargalum Vaasampannugiradharku Dhesam Visdhaaramaayirukkiradhu; Avargaludaiya Kumaaraththigalai Namakku Manaivigalaagak Kondu, Nammudaiya Kumaaraththigalai Avargalukkuk Koduppom.
22  Andha Manidhar Viruththasedhanampannappattavargalaayirukkiradhupola, Nammilulla Aanmakkal Yaavarum Viruththasedhanampannappattaal Avargal Egajanamaaga Nammode Vaasampannach Sammadhippaargal.
23 avargaludaiya Aadumaadugal Aasdhigal Mirugajeevangal Ellaam Nammaich Serumallavaa? Avargalukkuch Sammadhippomaanaal, Avargal Nammudane Vaasampannuvaargal Endru Sonnaargal.

24  Appozhudhu Emorin Pattanaththu Vaasalil Purappattuvarum Anaivarum Avan Sollaiyum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Seekemin Sollaiyum Kettu, Avanudaiya Pattanaththu Vaasalil Purappattuvarum Aanmakkal Yaavarum Viruththasedhanampannappattaargal.

25 moondraam Naalil Avargalukku Noveduththukkondapodhu, Yaakkobin Kumaararum Dheenaalin Sagodhararumaana Simiyon Levi Ennum Ivvirandu Perum Thandhan Pattayaththai Eduththukkondu, Thunigaramaaip Pattanaththinmel Paaindhu, Aanmakkal Yaavaraiyum Kondrupottaargal.
26 emoraiyum Avan Kumaaran Seekemaiyum Pattayakkarukkaale Kondru, Seekemin Veettilirundha Dheenaalai Azhaiththukkondu Poivittaargal.
27 melum, Yaakkobin Kumaarar Vettundavargalidaththil Vandhu, Thangal Sagodhariyai Avargal Theettuppaduththinadharkaagap Pattanaththaik Kollaiyittu,
28 avargaludaiya Aadumaadugalaiyum Kazhudhaigalaiyum, Pattanaththilum Vayalveliyilum Irundhavaigal Yaavaiyum,
29 avargaludaiya Ellaath Thattumuttugalaiyum Eduththukkondu, Avargaludaiya Ellaak Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Sthireegalaiyum Siraipidiththu, Veettilirundha Ellaavatraiyum Kollaiyittaargal.

30  Appozhudhu Yaakkobu Simiyonaiyum Leviyaiyum Paarththu: Indhath Dhesaththil Kudiyirukkira Kaanaaniyaridaththilum Perisiyaridaththilum En Vaasanaiyai Neengal Keduththadhinaale Ennaik Kalangappannineergal; Naan Konja Janamullavan; Avargal Enakku Virodhamaaik Koottangoodi, Naanum En Kudumpamum Azhiyumpadi Ennai Vettippoduvaargale Endraan.
31 adharku Avargal: Engal Sagodhariyai Avargal Oru Vesiyaippola Nadaththalaamo Endraargal.
